# hyperterm-bold-tab [![NPM version][npm-image]][npm-url]

> [HyperTerm](https://hyperterm.org) enhancement to bold your current tab text

<br>

![](screenshot.png)

## Install

Add `hyperterm-bold-tab` to the plugins list in your `~/.hyperterm.js` config file.

<br>
